config.name: Convert to normal item
config.description: Recipes to convert Unique/Set/Rare/Magic/Superior items to Normal items, or Low Quality -> Normal -> Superior (item + Antidote potion + Stamina Potion).

config.name: Upgrade item
config.description: Upgrade to Exceptional or Elite - item + Antidote Potion + Identify Scroll (or Ethereal - item + Antidote + Stamina + Thawing).

config.name: Reroll item
config.description: Reroll an item - item + Stamina Potion + Identify Scroll.

config.name: Reroll jewelry
config.description: Recipes are two of some kind of jewellry to one of something else.

config.name: Specific charms and jewels
config.description: Recipes to make specific charms and jewels.

config.name: Toggle sockets
config.description: Toggle sockets in normal and superior items - rerolls the item - item + Stamina Potion.

config.name: Add sockets
config.description: Add sockets to Unique/Set/Rare/Magic items - item + Antidote Potion + Portal Scroll.

config.name: Remove items from sockets
config.description: Recipes to remove items from sockets (item + Thawing potion). May require the ExpandedCube mod to handle big items with lots of runes.

config.name: Upgrade Health and Mana potions
config.description: Upgrade two Health or Mana potions to one of the next tier.

config.name: Split Health and Mana potions
config.description: Use a Thawing Potion to split Health or Mana potion to two of the previous tier.

config.name: Convert between Health and Mana potions
config.description: Convert between single Health <-> Mana potions of the same tier.

config.name: Recipes for Full Rejuvination potion
config.description: Convert 1 Health and 1 Mana potion (any size) or 2 small Rejuvs to a Full Rejuv potion.

config.name: Cycle between other potions/scrolls
config.description: Cycle between antidote -> stamina -> thawing -> identify -> portal.

config.name: Update recipes panel
config.description: If Breakpoint and Recipe UI Panels mod is installed, update the recipe panel to include the new recipes.

options.label: Put added recipes at top of panel
Put added recipes at bottom of panel

config.name: Fix unique items for crafting
config.description: Allow unique items to drop more than once per game and lower some item levels.
